flavor: Your home is gone, destroyed in the Last War, or perhaps annexed by a nation whose oversight you refuse to accept. (Cyre is one example, and plenty of others exist, from Thrane-claimed Thaliost to the hundreds of nameless hamlets devastated by the war.) You have turned to a life of wandering. But are you searching for a new home, or for a way to rebuild or reclaim your old one? Do you adventure because thereâ€™s nothing else left for you?
name: Refugee(eberron Player's Guide)
